title: 服务器一进就崩 求大神帮忙
txt_content:
服务器上次崩服之后 再进就崩 一进就崩 
下面是报错文件
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I just don't know what went wrong :(

Time: 18-2-1 下午3:04
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: bound must be positive
        at java.util.Random.nextInt(Random.java:388)
        at toast.apocalypse.event.EventFullMoon.update(EventFullMoon.java:215)
        at toast.apocalypse.WorldDifficultyManager.updateWorld(WorldDifficultyManager.java:230)
        at toast.apocalypse.WorldDifficultyManager.onServerTick(WorldDifficultyManager.java:352)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler_486_WorldDifficultyManager_onServerTick_ServerTickEvent.invoke(.dynamic)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler.invoke(ASMEventHandler.java:54)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:140)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onPostServerTick(FMLCommonHandler.java:251)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:862)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:669)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

969592505@qq.co 发表于 2018-2-1 15:29
EnderIO，Forestry这俩mod可能有问题，这个版本的mod支持这个forge的版本。
但是可能不是一个稳定的版本， ...
我去试一试

RINNDA 发表于 2018-2-1 16:24
删掉WorldDifficultyManagermod
好的我去试试
